entry.em: ..FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING
entry.data: WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM CDT /8 AM EDT/ FRIDAY TO 1 AM CDT /2 AM EDT/ SATURDAY

SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE IN THE MORNING
WINDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 20 TO 30 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS, WINDY WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS 25 TO 30 MPH, DIMINISHING TO 15 TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
GUSTS UP TO 50 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS AROUND 70
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 50
HIGHS AROUND 70

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
